title: "Neon Robot Retro"
content:
# Welcome to Neon Robot Retro!

Our website is dedicated to bringing you the best in retro-futuristic design. Our main feature is a stunning wallpaper that showcases a vintage illustration of a robot set against a vibrant neon-colored background.

But that's not all we have to offer. We also curate a collection of other retro-futuristic designs, including artwork, clothing, and home decor. Whether you're a fan of sci-fi, steampunk, or just love the aesthetic of the past imagined future, you'll find something to love here.

So take a look around and immerse yourself in the world of Neon Robot Retro. Don't forget to download our wallpaper to give your desktop or phone a futuristic flair!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A retro-futuristic wallpaper featuring a vintage illustration of a robot, set against a neon-colored background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
